hero.title: Finely Crafted Websites
hero.body: Here we care about the story behind the site. We don’t do high volume work, we take the time to sit with each project and craft it into your voice.

services.title: What we can offer
services.subtitle: Our team specialises in Custom Development and bespoke designs that solve business problems.
services.note: Whether the project is large or small, we build every site with an emphasis on speed, security, and mobile usage in mind.

items.title: Design
items.description: Brand-aligned UI/UX and visual systems for web.

items.title: Development
items.description: Custom builds, performance, security and maintainability.

items.title: Product
items.description: From discovery to product design and prototyping.

items.title: Content & Podcast
items.description: Production support for content and podcasts.

items.title: SEO & Analytics
items.description: Technical SEO, analytics setup and audits.

process.title: The Farbox System
process.intro: We offer a range of web services, ranging from design & development to product development and podcast production services.

steps.title: 1. Discover
steps.description: Understand the human element and business context.

steps.title: 2. Design
steps.description: Translate insight into clear, on-brand experiences.

steps.title: 4. Deploy
steps.description: Ship, measure, and iterate with care.

beliefs.title: Contrarian Belief #1
beliefs.quote: We hire for character first. Everything else second.

beliefs.title: Contrarian Belief #2
beliefs.quote: We never work for clients just because they have money. Our values must align.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.intro: A closer look at how we solve problems and ship results.

items.title: Nundle (Inland NSW Tourism)
items.summary: We built a strong web presence to clearly communicate Nundle’s value proposition and followed up with an online marketing campaign to increase targeted traffic.

items.title: Dummy Case Study
items.summary: We built a strong web presence to clearly communicate Nundle’s value proposition and followed up with an online marketing campaign to increase targeted traffic.

about.title: About us
about.body: We are a multidisciplinary team of Designers and engineers who know the value of story, excellence and the art of long-lasting partnerships.
highlights: Direct access to designers and engineers
about.ceoNote: I have been doing this for a long time (multiple lifetimes if you count in internet years) and I have learned that building the right team is the difference between achieving an acceptable result and knocking the ball out of the park.

book.title: Book a call
paragraphs: We only work with 5 clients at a time, so we can fully invest in each of them. If that sounds like the level of commitment you want from a service provider, send us a message. If all spots are currently taken we can still explore your needs and add you to the waiting list.
